about: Hi! I'm Paulo Bongato, a 10+ year professional of front-end web development and a team leader on business development. I help create new websites and designs for various technology innovations, build client solutions for rapidly-changing markets, and maintain excellent relationship with all stakeholders for overall sustainability. Hardworking, results-driven and self-motivated, I can multi-task on different projects with constant focus on team orientation, project quality and long-term efficiency.

works.title: Product Manager
works.description:
Business Development

  • Maintain excellent working relationship with clients through constant communication and active participation in project design, development and deployment.
  • Translate business objectives and client feedback into functional platform features.
  • Write technical documents for the development team and custom project manuals for clients.
  • Research and propose new technologies, innovations or strategies that increases the value proposition of the product and improves user interface and user experience.

Sales and Marketing

  • Assists in sales and marketing activities to promote various services of the platform to different B2B or B2C industries and organizations.
  • Attend conferences to promote the service in the ASEAN region.
  • Draft service proposal and initiate contract negotiation for propsects.
  • Design marketing collateral for online promotions and event sponsorships.

Project Management

  • Provide insights and expertise in building an open and efficient work environment the development and administrative team.
  • Recommend project schedules, allocate work divisions and suggest special bonuses for the each team.
  • Proposal, implementation and oversight of using collaborative web-based tools to improve work productivity.

Human Resources & Administrative

  • Work with senior managers in implementing office rules and policies.
  • Coordinate conference calls with regional and international offices.
  • Assist in screening, testing, selection, hiring and training of new team members in different departments.
  • Help prepare and review documents to be compliant with government agency requirements.
  • Assess general work environment and suggest improvements if necessary.
  • Assist the office manager with contract negotiations.

works.title: Web Developer
works.description:
Web Development

  • Lead the development team in creating websites for clients and prospects using Xtenit platform.
  • Proposal, implementation and improvement of new and existing features of the Xtenit platform.
  • Assist the customer support team to investigate, identify and address concerns related to website or email features.
  • Assist in testing and quality assurance of new features and system updates of the platforn.
  • Manage SEO of corporate and client websites.
  • Implement web-based payment facilities like PayPal and PayDollar for revenue opportunities such as pay walls, paid subscriptions, event registrations and paid content download.

Email Integration & Delivery

  • Design and implement email templates for B2B and B2C clients and prospects with visual compatibility for all devices and email readers.
  • Recommend email strategies and design to help improve subscriber interaction and reduce subscriber opt-out.
  • Monitor email delivery system and address issues of email bounce and blacklists.
  • Implement third-party relay services (SMTP) to address bounce concerns such as SparkPost. 

System Development

  • Write automation scripts using back-end applications to send custom client reports.
  • Translate and transition client data from external system to architecture compatibility structure.
  • Monitor, report and occasionally fix issues related to web server, data server, delivery systems and IP network connections.
